attributes.action: Make people speak english outside of their homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My new neighbours speak their foreign tongue whilst they are in their garden.
Maybe this isn't classed as a public place, but they are outdoors, and are therefore in public presence.
They look at us, grin, laugh etc.
This shouldn't be allowed to continue.
Would they like it if I were speaking German for example, and they didn't understand it?
I doubt it, especially if I were looking in their direction and laughing etc.
It has to be made illegal.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
